Text:
Brother, I am dissappointed in you. You know that the Internet is haram. You can not use this abomination!

Pray that Allah (rsvp) will forgive you for this transgression, do not fail him again!
Does it have anything to do with mass murder of  the jews and paedophilia ???

I've read a lot of your quran.  I can't believe seemingly intelligent people would fall for that.

We have Scientology here.  L Ron Hubbard one day said there is no money in writing books, one needs to found a religion.  He did and died wealthy, but it is NO religion.

Muhammad seems to have done the same thing.

So Muhammad went in a cave got high on gases in the cave wrote down his visions and started killing anyone that tried to explain they were not real.Now those that refuse to understand he was high continue to kill those that try and explain he was high.Just goes to show how being high can cause a lot of trouble.Kids just say no to drugs.
what mean you are a muslim? Simple, you illiterate who know no grammar, you idiot who believe anything invented by illiterate prophet, it is no haram but sheer stupidity to believe quram nonsense...
Duh whut it mean huh? Duhhhh?

.... and you only have A LITTLE BIT OF THE WHOLE TRUTH, you think we are the pedophile (oops, Muhammad), zionist, racist, jewish, etc. but in fact we are a bunch OF DISGUSTING, DEPRESSING, REVOLTING, SUBVERSIVE PEOPLE who don't buy quranic nonsense and show you bigots for what you really are, and not living in a backward muslim country, you can't have us killed or put in prison.

WATCH OUT OR YOU'LL BURN IN HELL... You should by now realize that here you are just a figure of fun and people use your silly postings to ridicule islam, which is haram, so by inciting people to ridicule your religion, you are committing a great sin. Perhaps in fact you are AN ENEMY of islam and do all of this so people can make fun of islam, if so, you are certainly succeeding...
